title: The Drak'tdon's Survival
description: What happens when a race of people in a distant galaxy must leave their planet or be burned to death? As they leave their planet in a group of spaceships of multiple sizes, they are forced to figure out how to live in long distance outer space travel.While doing this they must also figure how to survive each other at the same time, which seems to be equally if not more difficult.
author: Beth Chaisson
